item.title: Mmaxx
item.description: This is the only film of my first band. I was probably 17 years old in this film, so is the bass player, Mike Duffy. Our drummer, Mark McKelvey was younger, maybe 16, possibly 15. The camera couldn't record sound, but I recorded what we were playing on cassette as we filmed. Sadly, I lost that cassette a long time ago. We were playing "Oh Bondage Up Yours" by the X-Ray Spex. Mark McKelvey passed away a few years ago. May he rest in peace.
